metadata.title: CVE-2022-4255 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An info leak issue was identified in all versions of GitLab EE from 13.7prior to 15.4.6, 15.5 prior to 15.5.5, and 15.6 prior to 15.6.1 whichexposes user email id through webhook payload.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
